tag_list: dating, singles, meet, online-dating, meet-singles, certified-agile-scrum-master, entrepreneur, startups, senior-project-manager, mobile-apps, mobile-web, ipad-apps
overview:
CEO / Founder: MeetSmartPeople.com (World’s #1 Smart Dating Social Network) | AllJobsinAmerica.com (America’s #1 Professional & Jobs Social Network) | BrainsLinked.com (#1 Tech Jobs Social Network) | CalienteJobs.com (World’s #1 Spanish Bilingual Professional & Job Social Network)

Gil’s Professional Work Experience:

Program Manager / Product Manager / Certified Agile Scrum Master / Senior Project Manager / Web & Product Development

iPad Apps, Mobile Web, Mobile Apps, B2B, B2C, eCommerce, Web, Globalization/Translations

10 plus years of experience working with managers & stakeholders developing & maintaining priorities, performance metrics, quality standards, & scorecards; along with providing (SDLC) Software Development Life Cycle or Systems Development Life Cycle. Worked within an Agile/Scrum and or Waterfall development team environments to specify scope features and optimize functionality; along with demonstrating a comprehensive understanding of Agile/Scrum and Waterfall principles and best practices. Utilized the PMBOK 5 Project Management phases or process groups (Initiate, Plan, Execute, Monitor & Control, and Close) in order to describe and organize the Project Life Cycle from start to finish.

  • HiltonWorldwide.com - * Senior PM * (Mobile Apps/Mobile Web/eCommerce/Web)
  • HP.com - * Senior PM * (Web & Product Development)
  • Luminant (a TXU Energy Company) - * Senior PM * (Web & Product Development)
  • Lyondellbasell.com - * Senior PM * (Web & Product Development)
  • ExxonMobil.com - * Senior PM * (Web Development)
  • MetroPCS.com - * Senior PM (SMS & Mobile)

milestones.description: Launched BrainsLinked.com (Tech Social Network) on Thursday; 8/1/2012
Successfully Launched CalienteJobs.com (World's Hottest Bilingual, Professional, Business, Employment, & Internship Social Network)
Successfully Launched AllJobsinAmerica.com (America's #1 Professional, Business, Job, Career, Employment, & Internship Social Network) on Tuesday; 7/31/2012
Successfully Launched MeetSmartPeople.com (World's Smartest Dating Social Network. Where connecting intelligence makes sense) on Friday; 8/3/2012
